koohiiStory1: A SABRE is used to cut the stalks of plants being REAPED at harvest. They are then combined into a SHEAF.
koohiiStory2: The Grim Reaper´s name is メリ(Mary)…　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　Rare or no official Chinese reading.
words: 刈る(かる): cut (hair), mow (grass), clip, shear, trim, prune, harvest, reap
